tiePointGrids.name: x_tx
tiePointGrids.description: Geolocated x (across track) coordinate of detector FOV centre

tiePointGrids.name: y_tx
tiePointGrids.description: Geolocated y (along track) coordinate of detector FOV centre

tiePointGrids.name: latitude_tx
tiePointGrids.description: Latitude of detector FOV centre on the earth's surface

tiePointGrids.name: longitude_tx
tiePointGrids.description: Longitude of detector FOV centre on the earth's surface

bands.name: flags_in
bands.description: Fire test summary flags

bands.name: F1_Fire_pixel_radiance_in
bands.description: Fire pixel radiance computed from F1 brightness Temperature

bands.name: FRP_MWIR_in
bands.description: Fire radiative power computed from MWIR channels (S7 and F1)

bands.name: FRP_uncertainty_MWIR_in
bands.description: Fire radiative power total uncertainty computed from MWIR channels (S7 and F1)

bands.name: Glint_angle_in
bands.description: Angle between nadir view and specular direction

bands.name: IFOV_area_in
bands.description: Projected area of detector IFOV on surface

bands.name: Radiance_window_in
bands.description: Average background window radiance used in the FRP equation. This radiance is associated with the channel defined by the used_channel parameter

bands.name: S7_Fire_pixel_radiance_in
bands.description: Fire pixel radiance computed from S7 brightness Temperature

bands.name: TCWV_in
bands.description: Total column water vapour above fire

bands.name: classification_in
bands.description: Hotspot classification code

bands.name: n_cloud_in
bands.description: Number of cloudy pixels in background window

bands.name: n_water_in
bands.description: Number of water pixels in background window

bands.name: n_window_in
bands.description: Background window size

bands.name: transmittance_MWIR_in
bands.description: Transmittance of path to fire computed from MWIR channels (S7 and F1)

bands.name: used_channel_in
bands.description: Boolean flag indicating which channel was used in the FRP calculation, with 0 referring to S7 channel and 1 to F1 channel

bands.name: FRP_SWIR_in
bands.description: Fire radiative power computed from SWIR channels (S5 and S6)

bands.name: FRP_uncertainty_SWIR_in
bands.description: Fire radiative power total uncertainty computed from SWIR channels (S5 and S6)

bands.name: confidence_in
bands.description: Fire detection confidence

bands.name: n_SWIR_fire_in
bands.description: Number of fires detected on the 500m grid using the S6 absolute test. This number is only relevant for oceanic or daytime land detected fires. The other cases are associated with a -1 value

bands.name: transmittance_SWIR_in
bands.description: Transmittance of path to fire computed from SWIR channels (S5 and S6)

bands.name: probability_cloud_single_in
bands.description: Probability of cloud in pixel (single view)

bands.name: probability_cloud_dual_in
bands.description: Probability of cloud in pixel (dual view)

bands.name: scan_in
bands.description: Pixel scan number

bands.name: pixel_in
bands.description: Gridded pixel number

bands.name: detector_in
bands.description: Gridded pixel detector number

bands.name: scan_fn
bands.description: Pixel scan number

bands.name: pixel_fn
bands.description: Gridded pixel number

bands.name: detector_fn
bands.description: Gridded pixel detector number

bands.name: x_in
bands.description: Geolocated x (across track) coordinate of detector FOV centre

bands.name: y_in
bands.description: Geolocated y (along track) coordinate of detector FOV centre

bands.name: x_fn
bands.description: Geolocated x (across track) coordinate of detector FOV centre

bands.name: y_fn
bands.description: Geolocated y (along track) coordinate of detector FOV centre

bands.name: latitude_in
bands.description: Latitude of detector FOV centre on the earth's surface

bands.name: longitude_in
bands.description: Longitude of detector FOV centre on the earth's surface

bands.name: elevation_in
bands.description: Surface elevation of detector FOV centre above reference ellipsoid

bands.name: latitude_fn
bands.description: Latitude of detector FOV centre on the earth's surface

bands.name: longitude_fn
bands.description: Longitude of detector FOV centre on the earth's surface

bands.name: elevation_fn
bands.description: Surface elevation of detector FOV centre above reference ellipsoid

metadata.value: Synoptic time of single time fields
Scan period, defined as a complete rotation of the scan mirrors consisting of exactly 3670 1km (or 7340 500m) pixel acquisitions
Offset between scan index and corresponding ISP scan count
Time at SCANSYNC of the last scan contributing to each nadir image row
Offset between scan index and corresponding ISP scan count
